results.title: Police Officer Sentenced to Life in Prison for Murder of Sarah Everard
results.abstract: The extent to which Ms. Everard’s attacker wielded his powers as a police officer in the horrific attack has prompted a wave of new calls for reform in the London police department.

multimedia.caption: Outside the criminal court on the second day of the sentencing hearing in London on Thursday. The judge said that the “misuse of a police officer’s role” justified the steepest possible sentence.
